content.detailedDescription:
My husbad and i were on a road trip in northern clifornia when we were first dating. we were on our way to the redwoods, camping out as we went. we needed to find somewhere to sleep, my husbad saw a dirt road from hwy 101 and decided to take it. we followed the road for about 2 miles and it took us to the top of a mountainwhich put us up about 2000 feet. we ate dinner and sat there looking down at the coast which was about a mile away. we saw a light above the fog, i thought it was a lighthouse but he said it was too high but the light would would go out and then back on. it did this several times. we didnt think much about it. we went to bed around midnight sleeping in the back of the truck. i awoke, not sure what time, because we were bathed in a bright white light. i woke him up telling him there was a car that drove up next to us. when he sat up to look out, said no one was there and that is all we both remember. neither one of us recall anything after that, how much time passed, what time we woke up, nothing.

we didn't recall this incident until a couple of years ago when my husband saw an orb being chased by an f16 from our front yard. the person who posted the sighting of a planet size ufo in escondido decembr 2014, we saw it too.
content.summary: Bathed in light lost time

content.detailedDescription:
Grilling outside
shape of the object
strange looking cloud
dissapted
what the hell
dissappered

have video of black helicopters just after spotting object.
content.summary: Orbs around a circular cloud

content.detailedDescription: Between the hours of 2-3 a.M. central time in winona mn i noticed outside the windows of my house 3-5 entities were observing me and this has been going on for about 5 years but the first time i was able to get a real  video recording. as i noticed them we both knew we were observing each other and there was one set of eyes glowing almost like star like but glowed a yellow haze. it felt like we had a connection and they understood me and on the recording i asked them to light there eyes up if they understood me and then all of a sudden 3-5 eyes including the first one popped up all together and there eyes glowed like a yellow glowing fire haze almost. this went on for about 10 minutes. i felt paranoia until i started connecting with them and all of it went away but i experienced dizziness and almost like i was in a different parallel and missing time. to this day i hold the ultimate video clipping and would share it personally but i wouldn't give it away online because of copyright issues. these are 100 % real and are either demons of the apocalypse or are aliens from another dimension, planet, or parallel of some type.
content.summary: Three to five entities i observed and recorded them watching me

content.detailedDescription: I was told of multiple sightings by a good friend who was staying at another party's beach house. many of us had just graduated from high school, a few were a little older. i had just graduated. it was a party, so you could not call the group of 20-25 "reliable", but in those days no one who ever saw a ufo was considered so. our host had seen these things many times. he was by then blase'in his acceptance. i was very interested since 1963 or so, and was shocked to learn of his sightings and so we agreed on a post graduation party. we had much else to discuss, such as our group's eligibility for the draft, the war, government conspiracies etc. since i was young, brash, and non-conforming then i have picked my times to tell this story carefully. the craft was seen by all, but myself and another watched in awe for over 30 minutes. it appeared out of a cloud or mist, just above a tug going up the channel between the peninsula and anderson island. the cloud drifted along with the tug and the saucer hovered over the sound about 100-150 feet, just a few hundred yards away. after a friend and i assured ourselves we agreed on what we were seeing, we called our host out onto the deck and asked, "is that it?" he nonchalantly replied, "yeah, that's it." he went back inside. gradually the group came out to view. the craft began to move and went from shoreline to the top of the hill which was as far as we could see. it moved over the roads, which it illuminated somewhat, brightly enough for us to see.It stopped and hovered over a home. we wondered if anyone was there and what must they be experiencing. i remember saying if i were there i'd be  scared. i was really enjoying all this. i was filled with both wonder and foreboding. i had heard there was a small military installation on anderson island, perhaps even a missile silo, but i still don't know if that's true. it came back over the hill and was again in our line of sight. while over that hill we noticed a beam of light going straight up from the craft. while again in view it hovered awhile, and the group began yelling as young morons will do, but we were yelling at it. it shut us up by moving closer. we viewed for so long some lost interest. i watched until i suddenly realized it was gone. there was nothing but a similar cloud in its place moving up the channel. i didn't sleep that night. i went back there with permission and saw what i thought was the same thing again, but further off, at the tree tops at the north end of the island, and in breaking daylight. that was not a remarkable sighting unless you consider the first incident. i took it as verification. i have never seen anything like that since. i was, and remain 100% sure about everything i have relayed.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo was observed for up to 1 hour...Seen by multiple parties...Invited by host to view...Seen as predicted.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in high school.  it was in the evening around twilight. i was setting in my parents living room watching tv.  i noticed a light outside when i looked out the picture window.  it finally got so bright it was interfering with me watching tv.  i went out on the front porch and looked at it. it was stationary and made no sound, very bright and large. i opened the front door and yelled at my mom who was upstairs in the kitchen. she came out on the porch too. we discussed what it could be. she decided to go inside and get my dads binoculars to see if she could see any detail. she looked through the binoculars but only saw light.  suddenly three red lights came on on the back of it and it shot up the ridge line and disappeared.  it went from stationary to super fast within the blink of an eye.  it never made any noise and did not leave a trail or anything.  we both were baffled and confused. 

not long after that my aunt and uncle who lived up the street from us told my mom that they were on their way home one night and said there was a bright light hovering over our house.  they said they blew the car horn trying to get our attention but we never heard them. they were baffled by what they saw and told my mother the following day.
content.summary: Stationary light in sky that got bigger,no sound, three red lights came on back, shot up ridgeline

content.detailedDescription:
It is interesting rich was active in ohio in 1976. my girlfriend and i lived in a house by a golf course. i got home from work at 1am. i got out of my car and heard a very loud sound like a very large helicopter. it sounded like it was coming from the 6th green. her and i went to see if there was a problem with a pump. as i got to the green my girlfriend began to become afraid. i told her to come on and looked back. she was almost to the house. that is when i became a bit fearful. i ran back to the house also.
 we turned the tv on and could not find a station to watch. i said "no wonder! it is 4:15am. (1976) we just went to bed. never even thought of the missing time!
 the next morning her grandmother said "did you hear that helicopter last night? it sounded like it was right over the house." my girlfriend and i just looked at each other.
 a week later she was having some mental problems.
   i did notice a car stopped on the off ramp of 21 going south.
content.summary: Returned home from work @1am. investagated a helicoptor noice from golf course next to home. went back inside home, it was 4:15 am. i've always wondered what happened. 1 week later my girlfriend was mentally unstable.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at azores, portugal and about 11 pm i was going home i looked at the sky(just random look) and suddenly i saw something that looked like a green fire ball, a light with something that looked like a flame trail all green wich appeared from nowhere, flew very fast for a second and then suddenly disappeared. i did't hear any noise or felt anything, i just saw that misterious green light.
this has actually happened to me twice, 1 or 2 years later at caldas da rainha, portugal (i dont have much details) at about 11 pm i was in a car and i saw the exact same light apppearing and disapearing from nowhere.
it didnt look like a meteor, didn't light up, didnt come down, just flew high in the sky for a short time like a bright green fireball
content.summary: Like a green fire ball appeared in the sky for 1 sec, moved forward very fast and suddenly disapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was in dayton, virginia, a very mennonite influenced community, at a cookout with 12 people. went outside at about 10:15 to smoke a cigarette and happened to look up in the sky and seen an orange pulsating orb flying over an open field. it started coming from the north and changed direction to the east very abruptly. when i first seen it i thought it may have been a helicopter then realized it had no indicator lights and was making absolutely no noise. i yelled at all of my friends and they came out and watched it until it vanished behind the treetops. it was a reddish orange glow that was moving at a steady pace from the north traveled about a minute then abruptly changed directions and headed toward the east. it started to ascend and then dissapeared. my buddy grabbed his phone and started to tape it. i was in awe and extremely shocked but also mesmerized and intrigued at the same time. after it had vanished i thought extremely hard and realized there was no logical explanation for what happened, especially being as it had absolutely no noise. the object went behind my view and behind the treetops after about 3 minutes of watching it.
content.summary: 10+ witnesses seen orange pulsating orb.

content.detailedDescription:
Was doing dishes looking out front window. all colored lights blinking.
thought it was a helicopter. much to large for a copter and lights where
 spaced even along the object. it hovered for a few minutes lights started
blinking then they turned all blue and it was gone.

live on top of a hill (1500 feet) ran down to where it was with my truck
to where i could see 360 degrees into the sky for at least 30 miles and it was gone

thought it was a ufo
content.summary: Hovered above tree line lights turned from multi colors to all green and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I came outside to take my dog to the bathroom and saw a triangle shaped aircraft with 3 white pulsating lights hovering then moving slowly ne then lights went off and the craft disappeared. i'm a former navy rescue so i know all about aircraft warning lights and i've never seen anything like that in the military.
content.summary: I saw a triangular shaped aircraft with pulsating lights over my house.

content.detailedDescription:
You will find this in project bluebook for the summer of 1954, at the french garwood farm, east of the village of penn, in cass county, mi.  my dad, don garwood called the military, who sent out project bluebook, who listened to our story, drove around, and reported back that what we saw was either swamp gas or a weather balloon.  it was neither.  i will send my description later as i am late for an appointment.
neal garwood
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Shining, sperical craft, approx 120 diameter, flashing alternately white and red lights.  no emissions or sound.

content.detailedDescription:
A silent orb of unknown size traveled north to south toward an air force base about 3-miles away. 

the sky was clear and i was set-up with a 4" triplet imaging telescope, heavy tripod, and nikon d5100 set at raw/fine-the camera's highest quality level with a shutter speed of 1/50 sec. in other words, i was ready before hand.

there have been several sightings from the backyard position of choice.

the object's flightpath appeared level and it's speed may have been constant.  i captured at least six serial images plus at least one that shows a red orb nearby.

the object continued south until it disappeared behind the building/home line.

it is always exciting to see and capture such strangeness.
content.summary: An orb traveled north to south, toward an air force base at 9:02 p.M.

content.detailedDescription: In may of 2010 i went outside to smoke on the porch when a white object caught my eye. i looked directly at the object and noticed that it appeared as if it were burning up as if re entering the atmosphere. it surprised me to notice that the object was stationary and had such features. i watched the object closely for at least 5 mins before grabbing a camera. as it was brand new and had no memory card, i only got to take 2 pictures. approximately 10-15 mins into the event, a second, identical object appeared directly to the right of the first object. it moved slowly toward the first object, stopped, then reversed its course toward the spot it first appeared. as it moved toward that spot, it faded or dissipated until just the first object remained. i watched the object for another 5 mins until it too disappeared into thin air. i have checked the picture with negative and various other color schemes and the object hiding behind the "cloud" is quite obviously solid with multiple "wings".
content.summary: Object hovered 15+ mins. 2nd appeared, moved toward 1st, then away while dissipating/fading

content.detailedDescription:
in the summer of 1991 i had an encounter that i can’t explain but i have also never heard any stories like mine either. i do watch hanger 1 but again i have never heard an encounter like mine described on any show or report. 
	the summer of 1991 i reconnected with a high school friend of mine. i have an interest in the paranormal so we were talking about different types of paranormal stuff and he tells me about a friend of his, who is an alien in human form. 
	one theory of space travel is that the soul of the visitor could travel through space and take over a recently dead person’s body. this was long before the movie k-pax came out. i woke up and knew that his friend was in town. i called my friend and told him this he had the same feeling. the alien was as my friends ex wife’s house. 
	i thought he was making the alien part up until i met him.  i’m a bit psychic myself. jim looked at me and told me things my friend didn't even know. then he asked me about the scarab.  then yelled at me when i told him i didn’t know anything about it a scarab. he calmed down and looked me over then told me that just before a prophetic dream i would see an egyptian scarab.
	later he asked me other questions about ancient egypt. when i couldn’t answer him he seemed disappointed but said i would remember one day. that night i couldn’t sleep i kept seeing tarantulas crawling on me. i knew the alien sent the images. the next morning he said he sent them because; i didn’t tell him or my friend about it, because i was astro projecting to where the alien was.
 the rest of his visit was uneventful. when he left my friend and me both new we would never see the alien again. 
unfortunately my friend was killed in a car crash a year later. but his ex-wife still lives in this area.
content.summary: 'meet a humanoid alian

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,

i was recently inspired to post my sighting after reading the accounts of other individuals around the midcoast region and i encourage anyone else who is reading this to share your sightings too if you have had them.

since i graduated high school in 2010 i have witnessed star like objects on at least a dozen occasions.  the first sighting occurred in june of that year at 10:00 pm while several of my friends and i were in my driveway.  simultaneously my guests and i noticed a bright star like object in the southwest sky low on the horizon and almost instantly it appeared to brighten and expand in size as well.  it was pure white light that appeared similar to the planet venus in the night sky, but it was about double or triple the size.  it also appeared to be flying on a northerly heading at a slow constant speed.  after it had emerged from behind the leaves of my neighbor's oak tree it then dimmed in brightness and shrunk in size, fading out very quickly.  i do not think that it flew behind a cloud, the whole thing occurred too fast.  my friends thought it was quite strange too.  this was my first sighting.

since that first sighting in june 2010 i have seen the same white star like object many times here in camden.  it flew over my house one night in late july of 2011 i believe.  the object approached from the south and displayed the same brighten and fade behavior.  i got my closest view when it suddenly started to change direction to the west and made a roughly 90 degree arc.  at this point it had completely dimmed in brightness and i could see what appeared to be some sort of metallic core that reflected a copper or gold color.  it continued to fly on until out of sight.  i believe that these objects are piloted by a higher intelligence, whatever it may be.  they definitely seem to display intelligent behavior and sometimes they even appear to be reading my thoughts.  for example, on occasion as soon as i make direct eye contact upon initially sighting one, it will instantly brighten and expand upon the very moment that i first view it.  i have seen exclusively star like objects, with the exception being a cigar like silver metallic cylinder that i noticed by chance traveling southwest and seconds later it disappeared in clear blue skies during a sunset.

i am willing to talk to an investigator, thanks.
content.summary: Strange objects witnessed in camden since 2010

content.detailedDescription: In october of 2010, while visiting my sister and her husband in loomis, california i was sitting by their backyard pool. my sister was inside making lunch sandwiches and her husband had just gone in also, when i noticed what at first resembled a jet fuselage in the southeast sky above the large empty adjacent field. then i realized that there were no windows, no wings, only a dull gray surface with  a few apparent seams or lines. it was stationary, no sound, daylight so no lights were noticed. it seemed that as soon as i realized that this was a ufo, it suddenly wasn't there! it didn't shoot off into space, as i've seen before, but disappeared in an instant, like it had "cloaked", or slipped into another dimension? i ran in to get my sister and husband, but it was too late of course.
content.summary: Windowless "fuselage" is there and then instantly gone.

content.detailedDescription: The black cloud ufo
content.summary: I called it the cloud ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friend was sitting outside smoking a cigarette and something caught my eye and when i looked up my heart almost stopped there it was above my house and trees. it was huge ive seen things on tv and they say football size well i believe it now cause that's how big it was. it was huge and the whole entire thing was bright green kinda blue green and it was kinda just sitting there and we couldn't take our eyes off of it and for a about a minute and then it slowly took off and we couldn't tell where it went it just vanished. but it made no noise and the entire thing was glowing bright but it didn't throw off light if u didn't look up and notice a huge bright green circle almost below the tree tops u wouldn't have known it was there u couldn't hear it and to be that low it blew our minds. when it took off i was literally shacking almost in tears and felt sick to stomach. i watch the sky every night now i have seen several things in the sky but this wasn't really in sky it was so low. it was amazing and i promise i will be watching and waiting for another chance to see such a wonderful and amazing thing. and i called police dept.And told them and next night there was several planes in the sky around my house.I hope everybody on here believes me cause it was really amazing and really changed my life for real. i would love to hear from somebody and at least hear something besides your crazy cause i'm not i know what i seen.
..
content.summary: Seen football size green glowing circle right above house and trees with no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my car through my neighborhood, on my way home when i saw it.  thought it could've been a drone at first, but object was to big and too solid to be a drone.  then, thought it could be a person in a jet pack.  looked at some pictures of jet packers in flight.  there are some similarities, but nothing that looks like what i saw.  it moved very slowly from right to left as i was viewing it towards the east.  i watched it for about 15 minutes.  i have provided the original pictures with their respective zoomed in versions.
content.summary: No sound, moving very slowly.  there seemed to be a spire above it.  flashing light at the top and bottom now in sync with each other.

content.detailedDescription: Was heading to taco bell about 1am. my sister was driving and i in the passenger seat.  the a/c doesn't work so we had the windows down. we are coming to the top of the hill were taco bell is (zephyrhills) and to my right i notice an orange light low in the sky heading right towards us. i yell at my sister asking her if she can see the light.  of course not.  shes blind as a bat trying to drive at night, she cant see it because now it is floating directly over our car. im hanging out the window looking right at the thing passing right over us slow like a blimp or balloon.  but this is no blimp or balloon. i can see it perfectly. noiseless. a glowing orange sphere with an hourglass shaped object in the middle.  by now i'm hanging out of the car window as it continues floating sw towards tampa. this was no  plane or helicopter.   i've worked for  boeing and sikorsky. i know what an airplane and helicopter are.  it made me think of some kind of probe.  weird.
content.summary: Orange sphere floated directly over our car. hourglass shape inside. noiseless. saw it perfectly. 20-30 feet above.

content.detailedDescription:
My ex-husband (who was in the navy stationed at long beach on the bonhomme richard) and i were on camp pendleton marine base to visit his brother in or about sept. or oct. of 1965.  after our visit with ex's brother we went to the bus pick up spot on base, but the buses were not running any more because of the lateness of the day.  we called for a taxi many times, but they never got to us.  they kept picking up people on their way to us.  an mp had driven by us several times and finally stopped when it got dark to ask us what we were doing there.  we told him so he contacted someone over his radio who told him to take us to the bus depot at oceanside, ca.

the three of us - the mp, my ex and i, were all seated in the front seat of the truck, with me sitting between the men.  as we came around a bend we all three were shocked to see a huge stationary object in the sky that appeared to be in trouble because items that looked like strings of white hot fire were falling from the bottom of the object.

the sky was glowing with an aura of light of many colors that shimmered together:  white, silver, blue, green, gold.  the sky surrounding the object and the ground below it were lit up by the brightness of the aura and the glowing of the object. 

the object appeared to be glowing very brightly as if lighted up by an unknown source.  the object itself was vibrant white.  it's shape was longer from top to bottom than from side to side.  it was flat on the top and bottom.  from the top the object went straight down for a bit and then started widening like a tea cup top that gets wider at the top, but this was wider at the middle of the object.  the bottom was like the top, but turned upside down from the top so the wide sections of the top and bottom met in the middle of the object.  the middle of the object was indented a little with what appeared to be window portals that went around the entire object.

i'm not sure how to describe this correctly/accurately, but will do my best.  out of the bottom of the object could be seen falling trailing light that we knew in our minds was fire, but our eyes saw glowing white with blue, green and gold auras.  these streams were falling toward the ground that wasn't too far from the hovering object.  it was as though something inside blew up and/or was on fire.

i don't know when it disappeared from our sight.  heck, everyone at camp pendleton, oceanside, surrounding areas had to see it.  but i don't remember going from the spot where we first saw it, the next amount of time (which i have no idea how long that was as we were driving) that we observed it, and then i vaguely remember saying thank you and good-bye to the mp.  the next thing i am aware of is that we were standing at the ticket booth at the bus station.  i don't remember the ride back on the bus to long beach and my ex and i never talked about it again because we didn't have it in the fore part of our minds/memory.

i will try to address our feelings here:  when we first saw the object, we were all shocked.  we kept trying to determine what it was and what the heck our eyes were seeing.  the mp radioed someone who came back to him in an agitated state and yelled at him to, "get those civilians off this base now!  we are closing the base."  we all three kept looking up at the object which appeared to be very close to us.

from here on i can only tell you how i, personally, felt.  i do not presume to guess how the guys felt.  i wasn't afraid in any way for myself nor anyone else in the vicinity.  i was amazed and curious.  i felt the object was in trouble.  i felt as though i could hear, in my head, voices inside the object that were highly agitated and fearful.  i know, this sounds crazy and i even hate to say it, but it is what it was.  i didn't know how anyone could get up to the object, that was huge, to help them.  i felt concern about this.  at this point, i have some loss of memory stuff going on.  i don't remember getting off the base nor losing sight of the object.

i listened to the news on radio and tv and looked in the paper for any references to this event.  i found none.  it was as if it didn't happen.  i know i didn't make this up.  i know it isn't a fantasy.  but i cannot prove it.  i don't even have any pictures except for the one i attempted to draw - i'm no artist - and attach to this report.

as for witnesses, i don't know the mp nor his name, my ex-husband passed away several years ago, but lots of people in the camp pendleton vicinity should have seen it.

i would very much appreciate knowing if anyone else ever reported seeing this event and if so, what they have/had to say about it.  thank you all for your efforts to avail this kind of information to "us".
content.summary: Appeared to be in trouble over camp pendleton.  white debris coming from bottom.  appeared to be on fire inside.

content.detailedDescription: After a large family dinner on a dark summer night in bonners ferry, north idaho, my husband, his nephew and i were watching satellites from the front yard for about 20 minutes. we pointed and together watched a particularly large bright white "satellite" cross the sky from south to west in a typical straight path, when it suddenly stopped. it sent a beam of white light in a sweeping path from north toward and over us. it was almost like it was aware of our awareness of it. the beam withdrew, and it shot off into space in a moment. we looked at each other with our mouths open, babbled about it for a minute, then ran inside to tell our experience. of course, the rest of the family came out but basically shrugged and went back inside, nothing now to see. the nephew was then about 15, and over the years reminded us of our shared experience. it was great to have the three of us see it together so we knew it was real.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We 3 followed a "satellite" that stopped, swept a beam over us, then shot off into space.

content.detailedDescription:
was meditating in my copper plumbing pipe pyramid when five ets appeared to me.  i was very advanced in meditation at the time being a sensitive.  (almost clairvoyant)  they were not fully materialized.  i could see right through them.  i think this was because they had to walk thought the walls of my house.  the left most one telepathically praised me on the perfect contraction of my pyramid.  i used trigonometry to get the angles of the great pyramid.  it had a polished copper apex piece and it was aligned to the earths magnetic field.  i have 11 books on pyramid power and i did a cable tv show on it.  they looked exactly like the et drawing on page 533 of wendelle stevens book "ufo crash at aztec."  
    when they mentioned that they wanted me to go on their ship, i suddenly panicked.  i had read stories about people going on ships and never coming back.  i was in my second floor master bedroom and i got out of my chair and went down three steps of the stairs and turned around to see three of them at the top of the stairs wondering why i had left them.  i waved them goodbye and raced to my car and drove away as fast as i could.  i was really scared. 
     i now know after reading steve greer's book "hidden truth -- forbidden knowledge" that the government really wants us to be afraid to ufos and puts out false information about this with the movie industry, etc.  i now kick my self in the butt for not going on the ship.  
     when i was an amateur astronomer many years ago, i had two different ufo sightings.
one was of very large ship more than a mile across.  
     scanner on my printer no longer works.  so i can't transmit "ufo crash at aztec" drawing.
content.summary: Five et's appeared to me ghost like.

content.detailedDescription:
i am only reporting this sighting in order to co-oberate sighting #39830 posted on 6/19/15. i am a f.I. # 10544

  i was taking a walk around noon time (approx) noticed in the se sky two tiny wedge shaped objects that were white with what seemed like a black flek of coloring attached. (exactly as described in case #39830) they flew in an echelon formation coming from the se. they appeared to be quit high. if you held out your arm the distance between thumb and fore finger would be about one eight of an inch. they were going at a rapid clip. suddenly they turned west and began to fly in circles as though they were "playing tag " with each other. they were continuing to perform these motions when large wispy clouds moved in and obscured them.

 i'm positive they weren't gulls ( i live a few miles from point pleasant, nj)  if they were they would have to be gulls the size of a volkswagon.
content.summary: Two wedge shaped objects flying in echelon formation. white with black flek.

content.detailedDescription: Lots of the neighborhood residents were outside just after dark. i suddenly felt like i was near a power/transformer station. my hair lifted and i felt a magnetic type presents. someone said look up and we could see the outline of an object that was slowly passing directly overhead. as it slowly passed overhead it blacked out all the stars. at one point the entire sky was blacked out for some time. eventually it passed far enough that stars started appearing in the sky behind it. it never accelerated and slowly passed out of sight. i asked my father (an air force pilot) if it was a flying saucer. he said they don't exist and he went into the house. he later told me to never mention it again. i observed this event standing in my front yard. i could feel it's presence like a magnet was pulling on me.
content.summary: Object passed overhead and blacked out the whole sky. several observed event.

content.detailedDescription:
Well its hard to say...It has been some years ago...But i had worked overtime that night...Somewhere between 2-3 am...I was on my way home heading toward hillsboro on 16 there is open spaces for 7 miles. there are no houses in between except maybe 2-3..But there are some distance apart. 
     as i was driving i saw a light off to my left. thinking nothing of it. i continued on. then i saw it again off to my right over a field. it had stopped  and was just hovering. so i pulled off the road and looked out over the field as it just hovered not moving or anything. as if it wanted me to know it was there. i must have watched it for a good 10 minutes at least. just as i was getting ready to go over to it, a isp...Had snuck up on me somehow without me seeing him. since there were no other cars coming from either direction. since it is not a busy highway,it seems deserted at times...Anyway the strange thing about the trooper...He didnt ask for any form of id...Or even a drivers license. which didn't come to mind till some time later. he did ask me what i was doing there..I said i was spotting deer. and he did say to me..Its against the law....He wanted to know if i had any weapons with me..So he checked my trunk..And then he tells me i cant stay here. not once did he ask for my name or address...Or even a id...All he had to do was look toward the field...Which seemed strange as well. 
    since he saw me looking that way. you think he would of at least...Took notice. so anyway i left, and continued on again. and again as i was driving i noticed a light had went past me on the right and was now in front of me off in the distance....As i was approaching hillsboro..I could see it as if it was hovering over the courthouse.....But the closer i got the more farther it would be as if it was moving away...Or wanted me to follow it...Yet it only seemed like it was only about a 1/4 of a mile in front of me.But never left my eyes. finally i got home..It was about 3 or 4 in the morning...Which seemed strange when it is only about a 20 minute drive. as i turned the cornor to my house...I noticed just how close it was..So i got out of my car after i reached home.. went  into the house..And decided to look outside to see if it was still there. so i went out..And off in the distance are some woods..So i focused on the woods. that's when i saw it again.  i could see it among the trees...The woods were at least 3 blocks away. so i stood on  my porch watching it...As i stood there i noticed what appeared to be a beam of light shining down toward the ground...I may have seen a couple of et's standing next to the craft...But i cant be sure...It could of been some small trees...But anyway..As i watched it appeared to me as if they were trying to retrieve something from the ground...It may have been a body of a et..Now i am thinking a craft may have crashed there years ago..And no one thought much of it..So no one ever bothered to report it..I think there is a craft there..As if it had either been buried there..Or something was there they need to get from the ground.. i am sure something was or is still there ...As i stood there i thought i would try something. so i went got my flashlight...And shined it toward the woods. you could see the outline of the trees from the light that was coming from the woods.
  i had a spot light that would shine for a mile..So i turned it on...And off  maybe 3 times...When at first i saw this bright light coming back at me..The next thing i knew..It must of been an energy beam...When it hit me it didn't hurt...But it knocked me back about 5ft. then i got scared went back into my house...And watched it from my window...All of a sudden i felt so tired..As if i was being forced to sleep...I just got so tired..I managed to make it to my bed..And i was out...But just before i passed out...I could hear a humming noise over my house.. whatever it was..It had cast a shadow over my house....And that was that...I can tell you a whole lot of sightings i have had....And why i believe they are coming ..I think i know why..I have to many  it would take me about 3 days just to write to you about them..And to finish my reports...If you was to come to my house..It would take most of the day just to tell them all to you. so if you want to write a book about them..Or add them to one...Let me know..I got maybe 2 chapters in me...May 3 at the most..Or more..
content.summary: I saw it among some trees in the woods near where i live....

content.detailedDescription:
I was bout 10.  riding a bike on a warm sunny day.  fall or spring.  i heard a humming sound and looked up.  saw a heart shapped dull grey object moving slowly toward the nw. it had a thin but large purple trident on the bottom.  if slowly disappeared over the neighbors house.   

it was approx 200' from tip to end and about 200 to 300' in altitude.  it was above the trees, but below the clouds.  

i was transfixed as i observed the object, but terrified after it disappeared.   i ran into my house where i told my mother who was too busy to care.  i was only 10 or so, and had no reason to be that afraid.   but i was terrified and i still don't know why.  

an odd, bit another event that occurred about that same time also happened to me.  it was a warm spring or fall  night. the kitchen door was open as i played on the floor with army men.  i felt like i was being watched. i looked outside and saw a large face staring at me over a concrete railing of the porch.  i smiled than the eyes glowed red causing me to scream.   my parents came into the room as the creature left.  

we went outside and noticed foot prints as it has rained.  as the railing was about 10 ft above the ground my father had my mom take me inside.  he looked around, but never said a word.  

i don't know if these events are related.  i fact, the creature was more like a "big foot". none the less they occurred about the same time.
content.summary: I was bout 10. playing outside. heard hum. looked up dull grey heart shape object slowly flying till disappeared over neighbors house had purple trident on bottom

content.detailedDescription: Walking home from south mpls at 3am got over this bridge by these native projects that's when i was walking in the street and out the corner of my eye i thought was just a street light but once i looked closer i saw what i can describe is a disc it was shiny gold like and was there a few seconds than it shot off at incredible speed and was gone... all this time it made no noise...I was walking in a real dark street so i ran tell i got to franklin where my encounter ends but i saw glowings orbs in side my house a couple times leading up to this advent
content.summary: Was there than was gone as it shot off like shooting star that fast

content.detailedDescription:
i decided to spends he night at the creek behind my house last night...The night of june 19 into june 20. it was overcast when i went to bed but i woke at 1 am and stars were shining bright. i laid awake watching the stars then pulled out my ipad to play a silly game before i went back to sleep. both our family cats had stayed with me at the creek side. one was curled up laying between my feet. at 0204 (2:04 am) on june 20, 2015 something very bright caught my attention from my ipad. it was in the furthest left of my peripheral vision as i was pretty much laying on my back. i turned and saw this very unfamiliar sight. i immediately clicked my screen off and dropped my ipad to my chest and turned my head to the east and watched it, there are six prominent trees off that direction and from my view it was just skimming above the trees, though i am certain it was in fact fur back. i thought at first it was a chinese lantern but it was ten times brighter and i could see because the silhouette of the trees it was moving rapidly definitely not drifting in the wind. it was moving mostly straight left to right but seemed to have some slight waving up and down. as it hit the last of the six prominent trees it became obstructed by the last tree and was instantly gone from my view. i'd say roughly eight seconds total viewing time.  as soon as it was out of view my cat startled and jumped from my feet which assisted with an uneasy feeling lol. since my wifi reaches the creek i posted on facebook....You know in case something happens. and i texted my eldest daughter who stayed up late very often. she responded so i called her and told her what i had just saw. helped me feel not so alone as well as to share what i had seen. 
 i do see jets overhead often so don't think much about them but earlier in the evening i did see one with no flashing lights and it seemed wrong, enough so that i had pointed my bright flashlight at it, but not odd enough that i gave it much thought. i had my phone/camera at the ready he rest of the night but nothing else was seen.
  this was extremely odd and i add it now to two other unexplainable life experiences.
content.summary: Bright enough to pull my attention away from ipad game and it was way off in the corner of my view.

content.detailedDescription: In 1991 i was living with my brother in california covina my sister in law asked me if i want to take a ride with her to her cousins house i sent sure why notwe got to my sister in laws cousins house they decided to go to the store they asked me if i wanted to go to the store with them i said is it okay if i stay they said sure you can stay i axed her alsoif i can go swimming in our underground pool she said sure. they left i was doing laps in the pool set up on the pool with my legs in the water i felt uncomfortable this for some reason i look side to side then i look up and there i see something in the sky i was beside myself the back of my hair stand up i stood upi kept on of observing itabout 3 minutes 04 i realize that i was alone in the house and in the yard i felt very uncomfortable in this for some reason i started walking towards the house where there is a sliding door while i'm walking i keep my eyes on the object in the sky i didn't believe what i was seeingi kept my eye on it until i reached for the door sliding door and then i can see the roof where i'm about to go into the side door into the house i close the sliding door behind me i was so spooked i walked into all the rooms of the house close all the windows lock all the doors something just told me to do that my head was still standing i felt uncomfortable this went to the kitchen grav me a knife turn the tv on put the knife under the cushion of the sofa next to mejust in case i needed it i was staring at the tvand all i can remember somebody open up the doorand it was my sister in law with her cousinwhere i was staying at with this happened. i didn't tell nobody for they thinking that i was hallucinating or that i was crazy.It was very very uncomfortable feeling that i went through this.That happened in 1991 october i always think about that behind my head and wonder why was i the only one that saw that i know what i saw i cannot explain it i stood there looking at it but the back of my hairs on my neck and i thought it was telling me something different like safety.In my entire life i never really got into ufo showsall moviesuntil i saw what i sawin 1991 in california.Came back to new york living in long island new york in central islip was myself and my youngest daughter vanessa we were in the back talking and we seeing an object coming from north east it was a v-shape this one she seen it and i sort i was little relieved that she saw it too but not happy that she sort but i know what she saw and i saw what the same here in new york i wish someone was with me in california to see what i saw hovering over my head very high it was not a bloom it was not a helicopter i don't know what it wasat times i think did i really see thatand i wish someone would was there with me to say yes what you saw was what i saw but this is my story i will take it to my grave i know what i saw and no one can tell me any different. yours truly [name removed/cms/tg].
content.summary: In backyard looked up and saw object.
